about_the_game:
About Paradise Away

Paradise Away is a survival base building game, take control over multiple characters, get their trust and follow the story!

What would you do if you end up in a desert island with a group of strangers?

Manage the group of strangers, get their trust and survive the enemies of the island!

Manage the relation with each strangers

Each character is different from the other, will you be able to satisfy each request and get a long term relation with each one of them?

Escape!

Build and research new technologies in order to escape from the island!

Rule the Island!

Choose the best law to issue in order to keep the trust of your crew!

Features:

  • Build your Base in the middle of the ocean.
  • Assign the characters that trust you to different jobs.
  • Fight animals and other night creatures!
  • Research new abilities and buildings.
  • Issue the community rules.
  • Escape from the islands.
  • Meet the strangers that are living this experience with you!
